name: Orange boy
description:
Controls:

Arrow keys or WASD to move.

Left mouse key to draw and Right to erase

F key to shoot blue bullet, G key for green bullet and H for red bullet.

Created by BEARBOY STUDIOS

Visit our website

Like us on Facebook

Follow us on Twitter

Follow us on Instagram

A short template made by Viridino Studios (@ViridinoStudios) that we added our touch to. Made in just a couple of hours over 3 days, we really liked the concept of the template and wanted to see what could come out.

Credits
